mapper.select: SELECT a.visitNumber, a.procedureName, a.procedureDate, a.defaultPrice, a.procedurePrice, a.hairdresserName, a.memo FROM ( SELECT @rownum := @rownum+1 AS visitNumber, sm.name AS procedureName, cph.date_yyyymmdd AS procedureDate, cph.default_price AS defaultPrice, cph.price AS procedurePrice, h.name AS hairdresserName, cph.memo FROM customer_procedure_history cph INNER JOIN shop_menu sm ON cph.shop_menu_id = sm.id LEFT OUTER JOIN hairdresser h ON cph.hairdresser_id = h.id ,(SELECT @rownum := 0) AS R WHERE cph.shop_id = #{shopId} AND cph.customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY cph.date_yyyymmdd ASC ) a ORDER BY a.visitNumber DESC
